data.title: Bitdeer Expands Bitcoin Mining with $21M Power Plant Acquisition
data.description:
The post Bitdeer Expands Bitcoin Mining with $21M Power Plant Acquisition appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News
Jihan Wu’s Bitcoin mining firm, Bitdeer, has acquired 19 acres near Fox Creek, Alberta, for $21.7 million, securing a 101 MW site permit. The company plans to build a natural gas power plant and a 99 MW Bitcoin mining data center. The power plant’s construction will require an...
source: https://coinpedia.org/crypto-live-news/bitdeer-expands-bitcoin-mining-with-21m-power-plant-acquisition/

data.title: Canadian blockchain company Neptune buys 20 BTC and 1 million DOGE
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Canadian blockchain company Neptune Digital Assets Corp. announced that it has increased its holdings by 20 BTC at an average price of $99,833, totaling approximately $2 million. The acquisition was carried out from January 26 to February 3, 2025, increasing Neptune's total Bitcoin holdings to 376 BTC.
In addition to expanding its Bitcoin reserves, Neptune also purchased 1,000,000 DOGE through strategic derivatives on December 27, 2024 at an average price of $0.37, further diversifying its cryptocurrency portfolio.

data.title: Chainalysis Partners with Lukka to Integrate Off-Chain Data into Its VASP Risk Product
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News Blockchain analysis company Chainalysis has partnered with data and software solutions provider Lukka to enhance its virtual asset service provider (VASP) risk product, which can be used by financial institutions, crypto enterprises, regulators and other users. Chainalysis said that this integration will enable organizations to better assess potential risks and track illegal activities. It is also expected to improve detection and compliance, enabling developers to use insights to create solutions to enhance customer protection.

data.title: AscendEX will launch crow with knife ($CAW)
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: AscendEX (formerly BitMax) will launch crow with knife ($CAW) at 20:00 on February 5, opening the $CAW/USDT trading pair, and is now open for deposits.

data.title: Bitcoin(BTC) Drops Below 98,000 USDT with a 1.24% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Feb 05, 2025, 05:12 AM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Bitcoin has dropped below 98,000 USDT and is now trading at 97,977.671875 USDT, with a narrowed 1.24% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Arkham Expands Monitoring of Satoshi-Linked Bitcoin Addresses
data.description: According to Odaily, Arkham has expanded its monitoring of entities linked to Bitcoin's creator, Satoshi Nakamoto, by adding an additional 22,000 Satoshi addresses. The total Bitcoin balance of these addresses now stands at 1,096,354 BTC, valued at approximately $107.46 billion. These addresses are associated with a known mining pattern called the Patoshi pattern and include the only known address where Satoshi spent Bitcoin.

data.title: Bitcoin Whales Accumulate Amid Sell-Offs: What to Expect from Bitcoin Price?
data.description:
Bitcoin price has fallen below important support levels. The collapse of main support zones has triggered a shift toward fearful market sentiment, resulting in increased forced sales and heightened bearish market positions. During the current market downturn, institutional investors have demonstrated an opposite reaction to typical market behavior. Bitcoin whales continue to buy more BTC...
source: https://www.thecoinrepublic.com/2025/02/04/bitcoin-whales-accumulate-amid-sell-offs-what-to-expect-from-bitcoin-price/

data.title: Arkham updates Satoshi Nakamoto’s holdings, with current holdings worth approximately $107.46 billion
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News Arkham has added an additional 22,000 Satoshi addresses to the Satoshi entities it monitors, with a total current BTC balance of 1,096,354, worth approximately $107.46 billion. These addresses originate from a known mining pattern called the Patoshi pattern, and include the only (known) address where Satoshi spent BTC.

The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is taking a new approach to regulating the crypto industry with the launch of its new Crypto Task Force, moving away from past enforcement-heavy tactics. Led by Commissioner Hester Peirce, often referred to...
source: https://coinpedia.org/news/sec-commissioner-hester-peirce-announces-a-new-crypto-task-force-for-crypto-regulations/

data.title: Stripe Completes $1.1 Billion Acquisition of Bridge and Adds Its Team
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Payment company Stripe officially completed the acquisition of stablecoin infrastructure company Bridge on Tuesday, spending $1.1 billion. This is Stripe's largest acquisition to date, marking its major layout in the field of stablecoins. 
Bridge's team of about 60 people held a formal induction meeting in San Francisco. New employees received training on Stripe culture, including a crash course on how to write like a Stripe employee and an introduction to Collison's business. These are all part of Stripe's standard fintech training camp, which is held every two weeks for new employees. 
Bridge focuses on helping companies accept stablecoin payments while reducing the complexity of direct exposure to digital assets, and its customers include Coinbase and SpaceX. For now, Bridge will continue to run its existing products, while the team is working together to determine the best integration method and explore new products that can be built on Bridge technology. (CNBC)
